plays.text: Goal scored by Marian Gaborik assisted by Jim Dowd and Andrew Brunette

Penalty to Lubomir Sekeras 2 minutes for Crosschecking Teemu Selanne

Penalty to Mark Smith 5 minutes for Fighting Aaron Gavey

Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Slashing Pascal Dupuis

Penalty to Nick Schultz 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Evgeni Nabokov 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Matt Bradley
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Interference Dwayne Roloson

Goal scored by Mark Smith assisted by Matt Bradley
Penalty to Aaron Gavey 2 minutes for Hooking Marco Sturm
